citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility has not yet documented a species-appropriate plan for environment enhancement for the Amazon parrot.
Birds are complex animals that require social and environmental enrichment to ensure their psychological well-being and
having a documented plan addressing such enrichment will help ensure that a complete plan exists and is followed by all
caretakers. The documented plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian and in accordance with currently
accepted professional standards. The facility shall develop, document and follow a species-appropriate plan for
environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of the birds housed at the facility. Correct by
5/30/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility has not yet documented a species-appropriate plan for environment enhancement for the Amazon parrot. 
Birds are complex animals that require social and environmental enrichment to ensure their psychological well-being and 
having a documented plan addressing such enrichment will help ensure that a complete plan exists and is followed by all 
caretakers. The documented plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian and in accordance with currently 
accepted professional standards. The facility shall develop, document and follow a species-appropriate plan for 
environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of the birds housed at the facility. Correct by

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
